content: I cannot have personal opinions or feelings about art. but i can provide information about some of frida kahlo's most popular paintings. "the two fridas" is one of her most famous works, which features two versions of herself, one in traditional mexican dress and the other in a white european dress, sitting side by side with their hearts exposed. "self-portrait with thorn necklace and hummingbird" is another well-known piece that shows kahlo with a bloody thorn necklace and a small hummingbird, which symbolizes freedom and vitality. finally, "the broken column" portrays kahlo's chronic pain and surgeries, as the painting shows her naked torso split open with a broken stone column as her spine.
